response.overview: The song "A View to a Kill" was released on the 6th of May 1985 by the English pop band Duran Duran. This song was written and recorded as the theme of the 1985 movie "James Bond - A View to a Kill". The song became one of the band's biggest chart hits and the only James Bond theme tune to reach number 1 on the US Billboard Hot 100, and also reached the number 2 slot for 3 weeks in the UK Singles Chart.
response.title: A View to a Kill
